dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
A standalone library for adding rotary embeddings to transformers in
Pytorch, following its success as relative positional encoding.
Specifically it will make rotating information into any axis of a tensor
easy and efficient, whether they be fixed positional or learned. This
library will give you state of the art results for positional embedding,
at little costs.
dependent_to.name: py-rotary-embedding-torch

dependent_to.description:
A concise but complete implementation of CLIP with various experimental
improvements from recent papers
dependent_to.name: py-x-clip

description:
Unbearably fast near-real-time hybrid runtime-static type-checking in
pure Python.
name: py-beartype

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
